name: Fashion Night Spa & Makeup Makeover Salon Free
name_original: Fashion Night Spa & Makeup Makeover Salon Free
description:
Help give the Fashion Girl a makeover. Start off in the Spa, then do her Make-Up and finally take some glamour photo shots!

* 6 relaxing and fun spa cures!
* 9 glitz and glamor make-up items!
* Take memorable photos of your makeover journey!

Come in and get a makeover TODAY!
